title: Expiry date for gifted skins?
body: So I wont be playing league for a while probably about 2 weeks and I wanna know if the skins that are gifted (in this case the ones from riot, hopefully I qualify for one) to you will go away if u don't accept them within a certain amount of time?

replies.body: I gifted my smurf account battlecast xerath, when the battlecast bundle came out, and i just logged onto it today and received it as normal, I'm guessing this works the same but don't take just my word for it
